001package net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns;
002
003import java.lang.annotation.*;
004
005/**
006 * Marks a class or method as participating in the
007 * <b>Factory Method</b> design pattern.
008 * <p>
009 * The Factory Method is a creational pattern where a method
010 * defines the interface for creating an object, but lets
011 * subclasses or implementations decide which concrete type
012 * to instantiate. This allows a class to delegate object
013 * creation to subclasses without being tightly coupled to
014 * specific implementations.
015 */
016@Documented
017@DesignPattern(DesignPattern.Category.OBJECT_GRAPH)
018@Retention(RetentionPolicy.SOURCE)
019@Target({ElementType.TYPE, ElementType.METHOD})
020public @interface FactoryMethod {
021}
